directions: Toast bread slices and rub one side of each slice with garlic. Place a slice of mozzarella cheese, 1 to 2 basil leaves, and a slice of tomato on each piece of toast. Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and black pepper.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh mozzarella cheese, sliced 1/4-inch thick
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Caprese on Toast
